I Am Tahamid,

Currently studying at the University of Rochester

My Interests

Click to find out about my journey through each

1

Astronomy

I am fascinated by the universe and study it. Currently I am interested in exoplanets, their atmospheres, and the search for life outside our planet and conducting research with Caltech.

2

Computer Science

I love using computational tools for my research as well brining different ideas to life. Recently been interested in Machine Learning and Deep Learning as well as Full-Stack Web Development.

3

Physics

Physics is everywhere. It's a tool that can be applied to anything and as such happens to be one of the things I indulge in more than anything else. From classical to quantum, physics at all scales fascinate me.

4

Teaching

I have been teaching since I was a highschool freshman. Started off as a tutor for cousins and now have been a Teaching Assistant for over 5 unique courses at the University of Rochester.
